title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.
description: Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to do so. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.
